OOC: Okay, well Beachcomber is a Minibot, around 5 feet, so holding you
up was a strain.

BIC:
<Sense of humor> he thought to himself. He much rather have that beside
him than a killing machine. Ironically in the war, there was many
Autobots, who were both. He remembered back, Trailbreaker, Bluestreaks,
Sideswipe. All of them didnt want to be warriors, they had to. Others,
just didnt have the make to be a warrior. Poor Firedrill, decked out
with some very heavy Firepower, but I would be suprised if he ever used
it to kill, he thought, what sweet sorrow, Beachcomber thought, curling
his lip at the bitter words he thought, he looked up. Beachcomber rubbed
the back of his head. He held up his hand, " I'm Beachcomber, and to
tell you the truth, I enjoy good company, and exploring this kind of
nature." he said, spinning around, showing off the sunrise, the prairy."
